toast.errorCreate: Failed to create item. Please try again later.
toast.errorUpdate: Failed to update item. Please try again later.
toast.errorDelete: Failed to delete item. Please try again later.
toast.errorLoad: Failed to load data. Please try again later.
toast.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
toast.actionFailure: Action failed. Please try again later.

dialog.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
dialog.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Do you want to leave this page?
dialog.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to log out?
dialog.genericWarning: Are you sure you want to proceed with this action?
dialog.saveChanges: Do you want to save your changes before leaving?
dialog.overwriteWarning: This action will overwrite the existing data. Do you wish to continue?

auth.loginFailure: Failed to log in. Please check your credentials and try again.
auth.signupFailure: Failed to create account. Please try again later.
auth.passwordResetFailure: Failed to reset password. Please try again later.
auth.unauthorizedAccess: You are not authorized to access this resource.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
auth.accountLocked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.

form.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
form.minLength: This field requires at least {min} characters.
form.maxLength: This field allows a maximum of {max} characters.
form.submitFailure: Failed to submit the form. Please try again.

file.uploadFailure: Failed to upload file. Please try again.
file.invalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please upload a valid file.
file.fileTooLarge: File size exceeds the maximum limit.
file.deleteFileConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this file?

notification.updateAvailable: A new update is available. Please refresh the page.
notification.maintenance: The system is under maintenance. Please try again later.

error.404: The requested resource could not be found.
error.500: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
error.timeout: The request timed out. Please try again later.
error.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
error.validation: Some fields are invalid. Please check and try again.

messages.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.name: Name
signup.registrationDescription: To get started with your account, please fill out the form. We look forward to having you on board!
signup.aboutYourCompanyDescription: Please provide us with some information about your company.
signup.agree: I agree to the terms and conditions
signup.verifyEmailDescription: Please check your email and click on the verification link to activate your account.
signup.accountCreatedDescription: Your account has been created successfully. You can now log in to your account.

verifyOTP.title: Verify OTP
verifyOTP.verifyDescription: Enter the 6-digit OTP sent to your email address
verifyOTP.resendDescription: Didn't receive the OTP? Click on the button below to resend.
verifyOTP.spamWarning: Please check your spam folder if you do not receive the OTP within a few minutes.
